sentences.sContent: Drop a grenade when a turret opens, but beware of bullets being fired at you.
sentences.sContent_eng: Drop a grenade when a turret opens, but beware of bullets being fired at you.
sentences.sCn: 当角楼打开的时候，扔出手榴弹，一定要注意躲避射向你的子弹。

synos.tran: 炮塔；角楼；小塔；攻城用仰冲车

phrases.pCn: 六角车床，转塔车床；多角车床

trans.tranOther: a small tower on a large building, especially a  castle
